SELECT b.id user_id, b.display_name username,
#{fileType} file_type,
count( 0 ) count FROM wp_posts a, wp_users b WHERE a.post_author = b.id AND a.post_status = 'publish'
AND a.post_content LIKE concat('%<a%.',#{fileType},'">%')
AND b.display_name NOT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notLikeUserName},'%')
AND b.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{likeUserName},'%')
GROUP BY b.ID HAVING 1=1
AND count > #{minNum}
AND count < #{maxNum}
